TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SrgsGrammarCompiler extends System.Object
public ref class SrgsGrammarCompiler abstract sealed

summary.span: 使用 .cfg 扩展将 和 XML 格式语法文件编译到二进制语法文件，并发送输出到流。

span.span: Compiles and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 对象和 XML 格式的语法编译为二进制格式，以优化语音识别引擎的加载和使用。You compile objects and XML-format grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine. 使用其中一种方法编译语音识别语法 可以减少 从 或 XML 格式语法构造对象所需的时间。Compiling a speech recognition grammar using one of the methods can reduce the amount of time required to construct a object from an or an XML-format grammar. 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14))。For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14)).

summary.span: 使用 .cfg 扩展将 对象和 XML 格式语法文件编译到二进制语法文件，并发送输出到流。

span.span: Compiles objects and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

span.span: Compiles an object into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14))。For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14)).

summary.span: 使用 .cfg 扩展将 XML 格式语法文件编译到二进制语法文件，并发送输出到流。

span.span: Compiles an XML-format grammar file into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 格式语法文件必须符合[语音识别语法规范（SRGS）版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。The XML-format grammar file must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/). 在访问文件时，会在创建或打开文件时执行安全检查。When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened. 除非关闭并重新打开该文件，否则通常不会重新执行安全检查。The security check is typically not done again unless the file is closed and reopened. 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14))。For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14)).

span.span: is .
is .
is an empty string.

summary.span: 使用 .cfg 扩展将由 引用的 XML 格式语法文件编译到二进制语法文件，并发送输出到流。

span.span: Compiles data for an XML-format grammar file referenced by an into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的 XML 格式语法文件 必须符合[语音识别语法规范（SRGS）版本 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。The XML-format grammar file referenced by the must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/). 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14))。For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/developer/speech-technologies/hh361674(v=office.14)).
